name: Fishing Prototype 0.1a
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A relaxing fishing game, wander the farm and enjoy your day out fishing.
(Made a prototype for my current in development games fishing system).

More info here discord.gg/oneratgames

Controls
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cast Rod: Middle Mouse Button.
Move: WASD.
Reel in and out: Left Shift + W or S.
Line length: Mouse Scroll.

Team
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Developer / Designer: Dylan J. Walker - @oneratdylan
Sound Effects: Matt Schenkel - @hxctropius
Music: Hew Wagner - @hewwagner
